sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JNITCMSTPL ( SITE_ID , TPL_ID , TPL_TYPE , TPL_NM , TPL_DESC , TPL_SRC , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , STATIC_TYPE ) VALUES ( #siteId# , #tplId# , #tplType# , #tplNm# , #tplDesc# , #tplSrc# , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 0 , 0 )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JNITCMSTPL SET TPL_NM=#tplNm# , TPL_DESC=#tplDesc# , TPL_SRC=#tplSrc# , MODIFIED=SYSDATE , STATIC_TYPE=#staticType# WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID = #siteId# AND TPL_ID = #tplId#
UPDATE JNITCMSTPL SET ISDEL=1 , MODIFIED=SYSDATE WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID = #siteId# AND TPL_ID = #tplId#

update.isEqual: UPDATE JNITCMSTPL SET ISDEL=1, MODIFIED=SYSDATE WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID = #siteId#

sqlMap.select:
SELECT
SITE_ID , TPL_ID , TPL_TYPE , TPL_NM , TPL_DESC , TPL_SRC , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , STATIC_TYPE FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE ISDEL=0 AND TPL_ID = #tplId#
SITE_ID , TPL_ID , TPL_TYPE , TPL_NM , TPL_DESC , TPL_SRC , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , STATIC_TYPE FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE TPL_ID = #tplId#
SITE_ID , TPL_ID , TPL_TYPE , TPL_NM , TPL_DESC , TPL_SRC , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , STATIC_TYPE , ROWNUM RNUM FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND TPL_TYPE=#tplType# AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY tpl_id ASC

SELECT SITE_ID , TPL_ID , TPL_TYPE , TPL_NM , TPL_DESC , TPL_SRC , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , STATIC_TYPE FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID = #siteId# AND TPL_TYPE = #tplType# AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 1 ORDER BY CREATED DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SITE_ID , TPL_ID , TPL_TYPE , TPL_NM , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC) AS TPL_DESC , (TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,1))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,2001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,4001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,6001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,8001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,10001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,12001))) AS TPL_SRC , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , STATIC_TYPE FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE 1=1 AND SITE_ID = #siteId# AND TPL_TYPE = #tplType#
ISDEL = 0
TPL_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
ORDER BY TPL_ID DESC ) A WHERE 1=1
ROWNUM <= #lastIndex#
)WHERE 1=1
RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE 1=1 AND SITE_ID = #siteId#
TPL_TYPE = #tplType#
ISDEL = 0
TPL_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
TO_CHAR(TPL_DESC) = #searchKeyword#

SELECT SITE_ID , TPL_ID , TPL_TYPE , TPL_NM , (TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,1))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,2001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,4001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,6001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,8001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,10001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,12001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,14001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,16001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,18001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,20001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,22001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,24001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,26001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,28001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,30001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,32001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,34001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,36001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,38001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,40001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,42001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_DESC,2000,44001))) AS TPL_DESC , (TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,1))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,2001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,4001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,6001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,8001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,10001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,12001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,14001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,16001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,18001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,20001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,22001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,24001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,26001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,28001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,30001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,32001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,34001))|| TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,36001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,38001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,40001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,42001))||TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TPL_SRC,2000,44001))) AS TPL_SRC , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID = #siteId#
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID = #siteId#
SELECT NEXT_ID FROM JNITSEQ WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'JNITCMSTPL_ID'

SELECT 'JNITCMSTPL' CODE_ID, TPL_ID CODE, TPL_NM CODE_NM, TPL_DESC CODE_DC FROM JNITCMSTPL WHERE ISDEL=0 AND TPL_TYPE=#code#
SITE_ID=#detailCondition#
ORDER BY TPL_NM DESC
